title: WhatsApp faces European antitrust investigation over artificial intelligence
description: WhatsApp faces an antitrust investigation in the European Union, where regulators said Thursday that they're looking into the messaging service's AI policy.
content:

title: Meta shifts resources from metaverse to AI glasses amid budget shifts
description: Meta shifts resources from metaverse projects to artificial-intelligence-powered glasses and wearables as the company considers shifting Reality Labs budget.
content:
Meta is dialing back its metaverse ambitions and redirecting resources toward AI-powered glasses and wearable technology, the company told FOX Business on Thursday.

title: Fake rape victim admits to AI hoax prompted by TikTok challenge
description: A Florida woman confessed that she lied about being raped by a homeless man, whose photo she generated using artificial intelligence, to complete a viral TikTok challenge.
content:
A Florida woman confessed this week that she lied to police about being raped by a homeless man, whose photo she generated using artificial intelligence, to complete the viral “AI Homeless Man” TikTok challenge.

title: AI 'bust' will be followed by huge bounce back: NTT CEO Abhijit Dubey
description: Dubey warned that the artificial intelligence "boom" is headed for a "bust" because enterprise demand is not keeping pace with the capital rush into AI infrastructure, leading to "overcapacity" in data centres.
content:

title: UPDATE 1-US senators unveil bill to prevent easing of curbs on Nvidia chip sales to China
description: A bipartisan group of U.S. senators, including prominent Republican China hawk Tom Cotton, on Thursday unveiled a bill that would block the Trump administration from loosening rules that restrict Beijing's access to artificial intelligence chips from Nvidia and AMD for 2.5 years.

title: Sam Altman eyes rocket company to take on Elon Musk in space race
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman explores buying or funding rocket companies to support space-based data centers for artificial intelligence systems.
content:
